# golang list should not report SWIG-generated C++ files in CompiledGoFiles.

[!exec:swig] skip
[!exec:g++] skip
[!cgolang] skip

# CompiledGoFiles should contain 4 files:
#  a.golang
#  _cgolang_import.golang [gc only]
#  _cgolang_golangtypes.golang
#  a.cgolang1.golang
#
# These names we see here, other than a.golang, will be from the build cache,
# so we just count them.

golang list -f '{{.CompiledGoFiles}}' -compiled=true example/swig

stdout a\.golang
[compiler:gc] stdout -count=3 $GOCACHE
[compiler:gccgolang] stdout -count=2 $GOCACHE

-- golang.mod --
module example

golang 1.16

-- swig/a.golang --
package swig

-- swig/a.swigcxx --
